pages.text: The Ascended Star is a $(4)challenge curio$() which punishes the hasty and foolish that equip it without first learning its side effects. It grants an additional fortune and looting level, and the ability to use a second super curio, but multiplies received damage by huge amounts. Additionally, unequipping it will deal a fatally high amount of damage.
$(l)Default Attribute modifiers:$()$(br)$(2)+1$() Looting Level$(br)$(2)+1$() Fortune Level$(br)$(2)+1$() Super Curio Slot$(br)$(4)+200%$() Damage Taken$(br)
$(o)You sense a malovent magic lurking within this item.
